title: Add EpicContext field to IterationContext
description:
Extend the IterationContext struct to include pre-computed epic context.

## Requirements
- Add EpicContext string field to IterationContext
- Field contains contents of .ticker/context/<epic-id>.md
- Empty string if no context exists

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] `EpicContext string` field added to `IterationContext` struct
- [ ] Field documented with godoc comment
- [ ] Existing code continues to work (backward compatible)

## Files to Modify
- internal/engine/prompt.go (IterationContext struct)
